definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
to take/to borrow/to pick (flowers, fruit etc)/to pluck/to select/to remove/to take off (glasses, hat etc)

sentences.english: The picking time for spring teas in China is usually from March to early May.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，春茶的采摘时间通常是每年的三月至五月初。

sentences.english: These bluegrass pickers say they try to stay faithful to Monroe's style.
sentences.chinese: 这些采摘早熟禾说，他们试图保持忠于梦露的风格。

sentences.english: Penfolds BIN 407 is crafted from grapes sourced from South Australia's best growing regions.
sentences.chinese: 这款酒的葡萄采摘自南澳最好的葡萄种植区。

sentences.english: Gather ye rose-buds while you may.
sentences.chinese: 采摘含苞的玫瑰要得趁早。

sentences.english: My sigh in the background as you pick out the cashews hates you.
sentences.chinese: 你采摘腰果的时候，我在后面的叹息声恨你。

sentences.english: Don't pick __ any of these flowers.
sentences.chinese: 这些花一朵也不能采摘。

sentences.english: Truth is a fruit which should not be plucked until it is ripe.
sentences.chinese: 真理是一种必须在成熟后才可采摘的果子。

sentences.english: When you get hungry, just pluck a pear off the tree and eat it.
sentences.chinese: 肚子饿了你就从树上采摘一个梨吃吧。

sentences.english: The winery uses ecological methods and harvests the grapes late and by hand.
sentences.chinese: 酒庄以生态科学种植葡萄，并且手工采摘晚收型葡萄。

sentences.english: They aren't ready to pick until I have to start wearing tights again.
sentences.chinese: 一直到我开始穿紧身衣裤时才可以采摘苹果了。

sentences.english: They're chomping at the bit to get their tomatoes in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他们急不可待地想在菜园里采摘西红柿。

sentences.english: The lotus seeds could be collected to make cakes or buns .
sentences.chinese: 莲子采摘后可以用来做饼或包。

sentences.english: “The low-hanging fruit has been picked,” says Spellberg.
Try to harvest the fruit before first frost.
sentences.chinese: 试著在初霜之前采摘水果。

sentences.english: Picking up the fresh strawberries was our happy time. We were orchardists.
sentences.chinese: 采摘新鲜草莓让小朋友们过足了一把果农瘾。

sentences.english: The time from the germination to commodity is 56 days.
sentences.chinese: 春播从播种到商品采摘期为56天。

definition: fruit (produced by a plant)/(fig.) fruits (of success etc)/results/gains
to take/to borrow/to pick (flowers, fruit etc)/to pluck/to select/to remove/to take off (glasses, hat etc)
blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
